column1: Little Goat Diner////As for the sandwiches
column2: some menu items have a "wow" factor for their originality
column3: but a lot of them are actually quite in line with what you'd expect at a diner
column4: like a turkey club or a burger
column5: but elevated to another level due to carefully sourced
column6: quality ingredients being expertly handled.  Didn't try any breakfast items but LOVE that they are served all day.  Again
column7: they really have a handle on what diners want.
